name: Prismforce
description: Prismforce is the only vertical SaaS for IT services companies, enabling them to build a digital-first, agile talent supply chain for accelerating profitable growth. Prismforce’s talent supply chain software suite for skill management, talent marketplace and forecasting helps technology businesses efficiently plan, staff and deliver projects while providing compelling career progression for its employees, driving  sustainable, profitable growth for enterprises and better employee engagement.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: AI-Powered Talent Supply Chain Software for Tech Services
ShortDescription: Prismforce aims to be the pre-eminent vertical SaaS for tech services and talent organizations

Highlights.name: SkillPrism
Highlights.description: Build accurate, dynamic talent snapshot and reskill them with SkillPrism

Highlights.name: IntelliPrism
Highlights.description: Create an AI-powered marketplace for talent with IntelliPrism

Highlights.name: OutlookPrism
Highlights.description: Plan ahead and fulfill skill-needs with AI-driven OutlookPrism

enhanced_description: Prismforce is a vertical SaaS solution specifically designed for IT services companies and technology businesses. It provides an AI-powered talent supply chain software suite that includes modules for skill management (SkillPrism), talent marketplace (IntelliPrism), and forecasting (OutlookPrism). This enables organizations to build a digital-first, agile talent supply chain, accelerating profitable growth by efficiently planning, staffing, and delivering projects. The platform also aims to drive compelling career progression for employees and enhance employee engagement, leading to sustainable, profitable growth for enterprises. Key features include productized deep domain knowledge, cloud-first architecture, modularity, easy customization, and AI/ML-first actionable intelligence.
competitive_advantages: Vertical SaaS specializing in IT services companies
roi_benefits: Improved project planning, staffing, and delivery efficiency
